name: 3M
membership: 3M is a member of a number of associations, including but not limited to the American Chamber of Commerce to the EU.
goal:
3M is a global technology company employing 20,000 people in Europe (90,000 worldwide) and serving public & private customers with innovative products & services.

3M has a diversified portfolio of solutions in sectors such as healthcare, transportation, energy, security and communications in addition to its emblematic consumer products (Post-It notes, Scotch tape...).

3M is an innovation company with more than 50 manufacturing sites and 10 R&D centers in Europe, and supports the long-term goal of sustainable development.
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Follow up of the environment legislation for compliance purposes: REACH... .

Follow up of policy & legislation in areas such as consumer, energy & climate, healthcare, transportation & security as key business areas for 3M.
